original: 正史中其姓名為綸直，倫直乃《三國演義》筆誤。為公孫淵部下，公孫淵反叛曹魏時，綸直和賈範直諫反對，皆為公孫淵所殺。
text: His name is Lunzhi in the official history, Lunzhi is a typo in The Romance of the Three Kingdoms. As Gongsunyuan's subordinates, when Gongsunyuan rebelled against Cao Wei, Lunzhi and Jia Fanzhi remonstrated against him, and both were killed by Gongsunyuan.
